channel.title: mini on Ritesh Sinha's Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in mini on Ritesh Sinha's Ramblings

item.title: Corsair Mini 4GB HDTach scores
item.description: I have this weird hobby of amassing USB sticks/pen drives. My latest acquisition is a Corsair Voyager Mini 4G. I’d heard great things about the Corsair Voyager so I decided to pick one up. The voyager mini is really tiny and packs 4GB of storage. My experience with it was quite unfortunate though, as I had to get the drive replaced twice (my work system refuses to copy large files to it).
